body:
Hi John and all other members,


Must say that Workshop was really nice!
I would like to thank again to Jan and Sandra for excellent organization,
and to Greg for making such good software as Radiance. And, of course thanks
to all other people who were able to attend Radiance Workshop this year, and
who made it really interesting and useful for Radiance users.


I'm also impatient to see presentations online, and try some of the things
related to complex fenestration :)


Also if some photos are available from the workshop (Greg, Chang, Axel?)
please put them somewhere on web!
I'll put mine photos in a few days, and send the link on the list.


Thanks again for wonderful time in Freiburg,
Marija
___
